resources.string: Which of the following statement is correct?
A reference is stored on heap.
A reference is stored on stack.
A reference is stored in a queue.
A reference is stored in a binary tree.
A constructor that accepts ____ parameters is called the default constructor.
If malloc() successfully allocates memory it returns the number of bytes it has allocated.
For automatic objects, constructors and destructors are called each time the objects
A union that has no constructor can be initialized with another union of __________ type.
Which of the following allows a router to respond to an ARP request that is intended for a remote host?
Which class of IP address provides a maximum of only 254 host addresses per network ID?
Which header file should be included to use functions like malloc() and calloc()?
Metadata enables database designers and users to do all of the following except
what the fine distinctions are between similar data items
Which type of signal is represented by discrete values?
